thread.section_title: GoMedigap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoMedigap | www.gomedigap.com
thread.title: hungrybill

author: hungrybill
title: hungrybill
text:
Agent Mitch Bouldin from GoMedigap called me within 30 minutes after I had searched for information about a new Medicare Supplement policy online. I don't usually do financial business from unsolicited calls, but he was so friendly and helpful that I did sign up for a new policy. This is the same Medicare Supplement plan F* that I had before, but it is from a different company for about 20$ less per month.
Please note that this policy is not yet in effect and I don't know how it will be in practice, but I am very happy with the results so far.
